text: Death Hunt is a 1981 American-Hong Kong action adventure movie directed by Peter R. Hunt and starring Charles Bronson, Lee Marvin, Andrew Stevens, Carl Weathers, Ed Lauter, Scott Hylands, Angie Dickinson, Maury Chaykin. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1981 action movies Category:1981 adventure movies Category:1980s American action movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong adventure movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in New Mexico Category:Movies directed by Peter R. Hunt Category:Golden Harvest movies
title: Death Hunt
